Reviews.Title: T-Mobile G2
Reviews.Author: Redd78
Reviews.Content: Love the phone, it is every bit as advertised aside from the scratched camera lens. QWERTY works great and it's speedy compared to my old phone. This was a much needed upgrade.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Sophia
Reviews.Content: Quick! Good communication and easy! Very attentive customer service. I would definitely recommend to a friend! Trustworthy and helpful. Great vendor with good products that are true to statement/description.

ProductInfo.Features:
No contract T-Mobile cell phone
Excellent Conditioned Pre-Owned Phone, You Will Be Very Satisfied
Phone includes a standard wall charger

Please contact us with any questions and we will replay ASAP
